name: hedgewood-helper
description: Channel Magick Spell Creator and Foraging Guide

scripts.minify:js: terser script.js -o dist/script.min.js -c -m && terser data.js -o dist/data.min.js -c -m && terser foraging.js -o dist/foraging.min.js -c -m && terser foraging-data.js -o dist/foraging-data.min.js -c -m
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o dist/styles.min.css styles.css && cleancss -o dist/foraging.min.css foraging.css
